feed.title: Comments on Great Social Networking Posts
feed.subtitle:
While I've been out attending the SXSW Music, Movie and Interactive Conference there has been a flurry of high-quality postings about Social Networking.

Unlike many of my fellow bloggers, I find it difficult to post meaninful blogs while I'm on the road. It has been my policy in my own blog postings to also be "high-signal, low-noise", so normally I don't just post links without solid additional commentary, however, I'm making an exception this time because of the quality and depth of these entries.

link.title: Comments on Great Social Networking Posts

entry.title: Peter commented on 'Great Social Networking Posts'
